p: The biochemical parameters such as serum enzymes: aminotransferases (AST and ALT) [ 29], alkaline phosphatase (ALP) [ 30], bilirubin (total and direct) [ 31], total cholesterol [ 32], triglycerides (TG) [ 33], high-density lipoprotein (HDL-c) [ 34], low-density lipoprotein (LDL-c), very low-density lipoprotein (VLDL-c), total protein (TP), glucose, urea, uric acid, and creatinine were evaluated by using an autoanalyzer (Architect c-Systems, Hamburg, Germany) by using a commercial kit. All analyses were performed in triplicate for every sample.
